ygData.subject: Re: North Ro and Freeport
ygData.msgSnippet: I got my scims for 40pp, high charisma friend bought them for me.  Human as well.
ygData.messageBody:
I got my scims for 40pp, high charisma friend bought them for me. Human as
well.

> ----------
> From: Andrew Palmer[SMTP:apalmer@...]
> Reply To: warriors_eq@onelist.com
> Sent: Thursday, May 20, 1999 4:55 AM
> To: warriors_eq@onelist.com
> Subject: Re: [warriors_eq] North Ro and Freeport
>
> From: Andrew Palmer <apalmer@...>
>
> I have 2 combines scimitars they cost me 47pp each although if you have a
> high elf friend you can get the for around 40 pp =). The scimitar's stats
> are 5dmg 24 delay im damn happy with these till i pick up something else
> =)
>
> peace,
> Klaen
> 16 Warrior SDoH
> Veeshan server
>
>
>
> On Mon, 17 May 1999 Sean.Clark@... wrote:
>
> > From: Sean.Clark@...
> >
> > Grukk no need magic weapon to bash dem skeletons.
> > The only thing Gruk found yet (lvl 12) dat Grukk can't hit with me Shiny
> > sword (Fine Steel Longsword - rocks!!) is da elementals in Lavastorm
> (don't
> > try and go there if you aren't an "Evil" race...the Guard will kill
> ya!).
> > Grukk hears them combine weapons are EXPENSIVE! Me hear 120 PP fer the
> 2
> > Handed Sword...anybody have info on prices fer Combine Longsword or
> > Scimitar?
> > Any Trolls or Ogres had any experience buyin from them Gypsies?
> > Grukklukk da Basher, Bristlebane
> >
> > -----Original Message-----
> > From: Patricia Halas [mailto:patty_halas@...]
> > Sent: Monday, May 17, 1999 1:04 PM
> > To: warriors_eq@onelist.com

> >
> >
> > From: "Patricia Halas" <patty_halas@...>

> Rank
> >
> > of Barbarian Warrior. Hopefully soon I will have enougth plat to afford
> my
> > dream weapon of a combine long sword (I have 10 plat now).
> > Any good suggestions for hunting in and around Freeport? Didn't like
>
> > befallen to much since I don't have a magic weapon yet. Kind of a
> bummer
> > when you have to run from a skel that cons blue since I can't hit him.
> > Haven't been down to see Troll Town yet. Wonder if it is worth the
> trip?
> >
